title: New: Farewell Dear Ghost – Fade Out / Tremble
content: Having announced himself with the rousing Cold Blood, Austria’s Farewell Dear Ghost aka 23 year old Philipp Szalay returns with his debut single proper, Fade Out, backed with B-side Tremble. The A-side is a straight up pop-rock anthem in waiting, complete with a call-to-arms chorus and early 00’s indie guitar riff, however it’s the flip-side that really interests me. A tender, heartfelt number, channeling Youth Lagoon from a slightly slicker, dare I say more mainstream perspective. Check out both below.
